about.title: About Four Winds Worldwide
about.mission: Our mission is to provide world-class logistics solutions that connect businesses globally with speed, reliability, and exceptional service.
story: Four Winds Worldwide Sdn. Bhd. was established in 2001. The company was incorporated with the big names of the industry who have been in the total logistics business for more than 30 years.
Having these prominent and experienced people, Four Winds Worldwide set out to firmly root itself as a global player in International Household Goods Moving and the Commercial cargo business.

In this website, you will see the wealth of experience these individuals bring to the table in the logistics world. Our expertise ranges from International Moving to Ship Chartering, Air Cargo Charter, Project Cargo and e-commerce logistics.

The company appointed Edgar Stephen Pereira as the CEO to head the International Moving division. Edgar who was the founder of AGS Four Winds International in Malaysia, sold his business to AGS France in 2012. Having had a long career in building one of the largest moving companies in Malaysia, he accepted the offer to build Four Winds Worldwide into an international moving company brand after serving his non-competition period.

What sets us apart from our competitors is our approach to international moving of personal & household effects. This is reflected through our very personalized attention to detail on the customers' requirements. The persons behind each move pride themselves with their experience in the industry, having worked with some of the big names in the industry.
Whatever the moving services might be, no move is too big or too small at Four Winds Worldwide Sdn.Bhd. Request an affordable moving quote today.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Comprehensive logistics and moving solutions tailored to your needs
services.description: At Four Winds Worldwide, we provide a full range of domestic and international moving services. Our experienced team ensures your belongings are handled with the utmost care and professionalism.

servicesList.title: International Moves
servicesList.description: Worldwide relocation services with comprehensive door-to-door solutions. We handle all aspects of international shipping including customs clearance, documentation, and overseas coordination.

servicesList.title: Domestic Moves
servicesList.description: Local and nationwide moving services tailored to your needs. Whether you're moving across town or across the country, we ensure a smooth transition.

servicesList.title: Office Moves
servicesList.description: Professional business relocation with minimal downtime. We understand the importance of keeping your business running smoothly during the transition.

servicesList.title: Secure Storage
servicesList.description: Climate-controlled storage facilities with 24/7 security. Short-term and long-term storage solutions for your household goods and business inventory.

servicesList.title: Vehicle Transfer
servicesList.description: Safe and reliable vehicle shipping services worldwide. We transport cars, motorcycles, boats, and other vehicles with specialized equipment.

servicesList.title: Packing Services
servicesList.description: Professional packing services using high-quality materials. Our expert packers ensure your items are protected for safe transportation.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Ready to ship? Contact us for a free quote or to learn more about our services.

householdGoods.title: Household Goods Moving
householdGoods.subtitle: International & Domestic
householdGoods.content: We make relocating your home simple‚Äîwhether you're moving across town or to another country. Our team professionally packs, ships, and delivers your belongings with care, handling everything from furniture to fragile heirlooms. For international moves, we manage customs paperwork and import regulations so you don't have to.

international.title: International Moving
international.subtitle: Worldwide Relocation Services
international.content: We make relocating your home to another country simple and stress-free. Our team professionally packs, ships, and delivers your belongings with care, handling everything from furniture to fragile heirlooms. We manage all customs paperwork and import regulations so you don't have to worry about the complex international requirements. With our network of 1000 international audited and certified agents around the globe, we ensure your belongings arrive safely at your new home, no matter where in the world you're moving.

domestic.title: Domestic Moving
domestic.subtitle: Local & Nationwide Moving Services
domestic.content: Moving across town or across the country? We make relocating within your home country simple and efficient. Our team professionally packs, ships, and delivers your belongings with care, handling everything from furniture to fragile heirlooms. Whether it's a local move or a long-distance relocation, we provide the same level of professional service and attention to detail that has made us a trusted name in the moving industry.

carsAutomobile.title: Vehicle & Automobile Shipping
carsAutomobile.subtitle: Cars, Motorcycles & Specialty Vehicles
carsAutomobile.content: Ship your vehicle safely anywhere in the world. We offer open and enclosed carrier options for domestic transport, plus full international shipping with customs clearance and compliance documentation. From everyday cars to luxury collectibles, every vehicle is inspected, secured, and insured throughout its journey. Our specialized team understands the unique requirements of vehicle shipping and ensures your car, motorcycle, or specialty vehicle arrives in perfect condition.

petsRelocation.title: Pet Relocation
petsRelocation.subtitle: Safe Travel for Your Furry Family
petsRelocation.content: Your pets deserve the same care you'd give them at home. We handle health certificates, vaccinations, import permits, and airline bookings to ensure your companion travels safely and comfortably. Our specialists navigate country-specific requirements and quarantine rules so your pet arrives stress-free. We understand that your pets are family members, and we treat them with the love and care they deserve throughout their journey to their new home.

projectCargo.title: Project Cargo
projectCargo.subtitle: Heavy Lift & Oversized Shipments
projectCargo.content: When standard shipping isn't enough, our project cargo team delivers. We transport oversized industrial equipment‚Äîturbines, generators, mining machinery, and more‚Äîusing custom engineering solutions, specialized vessels, and multimodal logistics. From route planning to final placement, we manage complex shipments that others can't handle. Our experienced team has successfully delivered some of the world's most challenging cargo projects, providing end-to-end solutions for your heavy lift requirements.
